title: Thornscape Battlemage
text: Kicker  and/or  (You may pay an additional  and/or  as you cast this spell.)When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its  kicker, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its  kicker, destroy target artifact.
expansion: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition
